thread.title: 'Escape from New York' Remake to Be Written by 'Luther' Creator
thread.title_full: 'Escape from New York' Remake to Be Written by 'Luther' Creator

title: 'Escape from New York' Remake to Be Written by 'Luther' Creator
text:
Published By: MovieWeb.com: Movie News - Today 
'Luther' creator Neil Cross will pen 'Escape From New York' as Fox plans a 'Planet of the Apes'-style reboot....
